name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lolsworth, UntilYouAreSoNude, ishuta, Zefiel, madnes, karljw, riotdejaneiro, mikeronomicon, Overmedicated, SharkOfSomerton, Thorfinn, Deusoma, DiamondMonster, re5urgam, grayestnova, bug, businesstime, Ebessan, NDCaesar, tommycrashwreck, lucidaconsole, Sargasm, atticusonline, Cracklewater, LordPretzel, Art-Vader, bob_lamonta, Baryonyx, luckypyjamas, shinsengumi14, aHatOfPig, cognitonaut, regrepsnefpoh, nutmeg, Spaghetto, alejandroadam, dropkickpikachu, heatbag, ibetso, Mastronaut, Rakadin, Pigs)

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, Interestingname, atticusonline, BillyLK, nocarsgo)

name: hollis
text: He did invent a weird nickname for someone he doesn't even like, though.

name: cleave
text: Yes. His gratuitous use of the apostrophe is uncouth. I haven't personally 'lamed' him once, but every time I see "'Stad" I frown.

name: quantumcasaba
text: Seconded. I will not 'lame' someone for sounding smug or pretentious, but there is no love. No love a'tall.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, mr_lostman28, 7th_shot, atticusonline, eddylee, tellumo)

name: semiquaver
text: Damn man these chubbies for soticoto are just getting stupid.  Leave them for when he satirizes the community's critics for humorous effect.

name: coldfrog
text: Damn man these comments for Achewood are just getting stupid.  Leave them for when you can apply the comedy rule of threes.

name: semiquaver
text: Damn man these good appeals to reason are just getting stupid.  Leave them for when you can throttle me with your bare hands for being a dumbass.

name: soticoto
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: wolfensti
text:
I hardly laugh loudly at my job.
Thank you. Thank you

name: shutup_shutup
text: He dissed T's hog.  Come on, Asherdan, say nice stuff about T's dick!

name: petitegitan
text: I rated it a '5' for gratuitious angel butt.

name: c_dizzle
text: Reminiscent of Monty Python animations, no?

name: achilleselbow
text: "Angel Butt" sounds like a poor attempt at a romantic nickname.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: flut!

name: shutup_shutup
text: That is what it sounds like when an angel moons you.

name: pohlhoud
text: T didn't die of shame, shame came after death.

name: sweatpantsninja
text: FLUT

name: pitseleh
text: I must say that "FLUT" is probably my favorite onomatopoeia ever.

name: coldfrog
text: If you ever read this again in the future after reading more achewood you are probably disagreeing with yourself.

name: rowboat
text: koodge!!

name: pitseleh
text: I must say, I still really like "FLUT".

name: rowboat
text: How 'bout " SPLUT SPLUT? "

name: numberkillinger
text: splut splut splut splut splut splut

name: numberkillinger
text:
splut

(totally failed to work last time)

name: heccibiggs
text: Personally I'm a big fan of "press".

name: rowboat
text: I had to think about that for a minute, but now I remember it. Like it was yesterday. Yes.

name: zorglemeister
text: I am also a large fan of "press".  There's a type of button that has kind of a large thick rubber cover (usually used in environments where moisture is present, such as spas and saunas) and when you push those buttons there is usually a slight air-escapaing noise combined with the rubber tacking to the surface that results in a sound very much near "press" as onomatopoeia...  I must find one of these buttons to demonstrate this particular sound.

name: rowboat
text: Also this .

name: heccibiggs
text: Thanks for getting what I was talking about.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
My personal favorite is splup .

It's from "Lewellyn Ash, Baby," which I'm too afraid to attempt to link.

name: honesttom
text: What about "pote?"

name: cracklewater
text: Mine is 'florch', which is a Gilbert Shelton creation, as far as I know.

name: deancain29
text: its totally the stuff that 'Ghost' left out

name: woodenteeth
text:
Euphoria! White light!

Psych!

name: quantumcasaba
text: I really enjoy that the text cuts off Teodor's head.

name: nigelchaos
text:
How em-bear-assing.
thank you very much, goodnight!

name: presterjohn
text: That hurts like a Grolsch cap in the throat.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Gettin' back into the advice game.
Onstad: I think I might buy a Honda Civic.

name: gmm
text:
What is perhaps most amazing is that T at first hits the top of the panel, rather than the actual ceiling, leading to the THUD outside the comic.

Somewhere that Understanding Comics dude is smiling.
